mapper.select:
select
from b2b_history where id in #{id}

select c.*,a.name,a.price,a.marketPrice,a.type,a.isMarketable, CONCAT((SELECT setvalue FROM shared_system_set WHERE setKey='imageUrl'),CONCAT(CONCAT(groupName,'/'),d.url)) AS image, (SELECT CONCAT(IFNULL(MIN(batchPrice),0),'~',IFNULL(MAX(batchPrice),0)) sn FROM b2b_goods_price WHERE goodsId = c.goodsId ) sn from b2b_history c LEFT JOIN wp_goods a ON c.goodsId = a.id LEFT JOIN wp_goods_images d ON d.goodsId = a.id ${condition}

select c.*,a.name,a.price,a.marketPrice, CONCAT((SELECT setvalue FROM shared_system_set WHERE setKey='imageUrl'),CONCAT(CONCAT(groupName,'/'),d.url)) AS image, (SELECT CONCAT(IFNULL(MIN(batchPrice),0),'~',IFNULL(MAX(batchPrice),0)) sn FROM b2b_goods_price WHERE goodsId = c.goodsId ) sn from b2b_history c LEFT JOIN wp_goods a ON c.goodsId = a.id LEFT JOIN wp_goods_images d ON d.goodsId = a.id ${condition}
select count(id) as result from b2b_history where tenantId = #{tenantId}

select c.*,a.name,a.price,a.marketPrice, CONCAT((SELECT setvalue FROM shared_system_set WHERE setKey='imageUrl'),CONCAT(CONCAT(groupName,'/'),d.url)) AS image, (SELECT CONCAT(IFNULL(MIN(batchPrice),0),'~',IFNULL(MAX(batchPrice),0)) sn FROM b2b_goods_price WHERE goodsId = c.goodsId ) sn from b2b_history c LEFT JOIN wp_goods a ON c.goodsId = a.id LEFT JOIN wp_goods_images d ON d.goodsId = a.id where c.buyerId = #{buyerId} GROUP BY d.goodsId order by c.createDate desc limit 0,6
